"Ulji Focus Lens" Joint Military Exercises Flailed by WFTU
articles.content:
"Ulji Focus Lens" Joint Military Exercises Flailed by WFTU 
   Pyongyang, September 3 (KCNA) -- The World Federation of Trade Unions in a statement issued on Aug. 25 in denunciation of the "Ulji Focus Lens" joint military exercises termed them a serious provocation against the DPRK and part of the plan to invade it.
 The U.S. forces should be pulled back from south Korea to ensure peace and stability on the Korean Peninsula, the statement said, stressing that the U.S. is not entitled to take issue with the DPRK over its measures to increase the defence capacity as they are to cope with the threat from the U.S. under the present situation.

articles.title: Vietnamese President on Relations with DPRK
articles.content:
Vietnamese President on Relations with DPRK 
   Pyongyang, September 3 (KCNA) -- It is the will of the Vietnamese party, government and people to carry forward and develop the traditional friendly relations between the two countries provided by President Ho Chi Minh and President Kim Il Sung.
 Nguyen Minh Triet, president of the Socialist Republic of Vietnam, said this when receiving credentials from the DPRK Ambassador to Vietnam on Aug. 30.    
 Expressing joy at the successes achieved by the Korean people despite trials and difficulties, the president hoped that the traditional friendly and cooperative relations between the two peoples would grow strong.

Kim Jong Il Sends Wreath to Bier of Kwon Jung Yong
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Sends Wreath to Bier of Kwon Jung Yong 
   Pyongyang, September 3 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il sent a wreath to the bier of the late Lieutenant General of the KPA Kwon Jung Yong, vice-president of Kim Il Sung Military University, on September 2, expressing deep condolences over his death.

articles.title: Greetings of Emir of Qatar
articles.content:
Greetings of Emir of Qatar
   Pyongyang, September 3 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, Sunday sent a message of greetings to Hamad Bin Khalifa Al-Thani, emir of the State of Qatar, on the occasion of the 35th anniversary of its independence.
 The message said that today the Qatar people are registering many successes in the work for the progress and prosperity of the country under the leadership of the emir.    
 Expressing the belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would grow stronger in the mutual interests, the message sincerely wished the people of Qatar greater progress and prosperity and the emir good health and happiness.

U.S. Forces in S. Korea Stage Missile-Firing Exercise
articles.content:
U.S. Forces in S. Korea Stage Missile-Firing Exercise
   Pyongyang, September 2 (KCNA) -- The U.S. air force in south Korea staged air to air missile-firing exercise in the sky over the West Sea of Korea, according to the south Korean "KBS" quoting a report of the Aug. 28 issue of the U.S. newspaper "Stars and Stripes." 
 The 7th U.S. air force present in south Korea committed the above-said maneuver in the air over the West Sea of Korea 130 km from the U.S. air force base in Kunsan from Aug. 16 to 18.  An officer concerned of the U.S. forces noted that such games would be staged four times a year in the future.    
 The U.S. imperialists are escalating the north-targeted war exercises in south Korea and increasing the military pressure on it, timed to coincide with their ceaseless large-scale joint military maneuvers in the waters around the Korean Peninsula.
